Constructor Detail

AeEngineAlert

public AeEngineAlert(long aProcessID,
                     int aEventID,
                     javax.xml.namespace.QName aProcessName,
                     java.lang.String aLocation,
                     javax.xml.namespace.QName aFaultName,
                     org.w3c.dom.Document aDetails)
Ctor for the engine alert

Parameters:
aProcessID - id of the process that generated the alert
aEventID - type of alert
aProcessName - qname of the process that generated the alert
aLocation - location of the activity within the process that generated the alert
aFaultName - optional qname of the fault
aDetails - option details related to the alert - possibly variable data

AeEngineAlert

public AeEngineAlert(long aProcessID,
                     int aEventID,

                     javax.xml.namespace.QName aFaultName,
                     org.w3c.dom.Document aDetails,
                     java.util.Date aTimestamp)
Ctor for the engine alert

Parameters:
aProcessID - id of the process that generated the alert
aEventID - type of alert
aProcessName - qname of the process that generated the alert
aLocation - location of the activity within the process that generated the alert
aFaultName - optional qname of the fault
aDetails - option details related to the alert - possibly variable data
aTimestamp - the timestamp of the event/alert
